notesStmt.note: In two parts; part 2, "The declaration of the fathers of the councell of Trent, concerning going vnto churches", in English and Latin.
Identified as STC 5189 on UMI microfilm, reel 283.
Part 2 formerly STC 24264; identified by that number on reel 1498.
Imperfect; title page mutilated (missing part supplied by STC); pages marked and stained; leaf K3 and all of part 2 lacking.
Reproductions of the originals in the Harvard University Library and the Cambridge University Library (part 2 only).
Appears at reel 283 (Harvard University Library copy) and at reel 1498 (Harvard University Library copy (part 2 only)).
